p: Network meta-analysis is undoubtedly a better way to calculate the risk ratio of rare events. It allows to discriminate the interventions which are lack of head-to-head comparisons [ 15] by indirect means. Thus, for our primary objective to identify the effective timing of starting AVT, network meta-analysis allowed us to make a distinction of the period between the early-middle pregnancy and late pregnancy on agent use in preventing perinatal transmission. Our secondary objectives were set to determine safety outcomes among different trimesters of treatment administration.
